trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time type converter for a component's data field properties.
trans-unit.target: 为组件的数据字段属性提供的设计时类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: The DataFieldConverter class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: DataFieldConverter 类是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常由引用的对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 你通常不访问的类型转换器直接。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>供使用的数据绑定控件在设计时和一起被实例化<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter"></xref> class.

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You typically do not access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> 你通常不访问的类型转换器直接。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>供使用的数据绑定控件在设计时和一起被实例化<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>
